COALESCE(SUM(duration_minutes), 0) AS value
COUNT(1) AS value
COALESCE(SUM(calories_burned), 0) AS value
COALESCE(SUM(duration_minutes), 0) AS value
FROM health_exercise_record WHERE user_id = #{userId}
